DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study observe PSA response incidence side effect patient diagnosed intermediate high risk prostate cancer treat Cesium-131 combination external beam therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Observation Outcomes Side Effects Cesium-131 Combination With External Beam Radiation Treatment Intermediate High Risk Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm adenocarcinoma prostate Clinical stage T1c T2c ( AJCC 6th Edition ) , NX/N0 , M0 Karnofsky Performance Score 90 100 Greater equal 18 year age Prostate volume TRUS ≤ 60 cc IPSS score < 15 ( alpha blocker allow ) Signed studyspecific inform consent form prior study entry Intermediate Risk prostate cancer determine follow : Gleason sum 7 ; PSA le 10.1 ng/ml ; Stage T2a less Gleason sum 6 less ; PSA > 10.0 < 20.1ng/ml ; Stage T2a less Gleason sum 6 less ; PSA < 10.1 ; Stage T2b High risk prostate cancer determine follow : Any Gleason Sum ; PSA great 20 ng/ml ; Stage T2c less Gleason Sum > 7 ; Any PSA ; Stage T2c less Any Gleason Sum ; Any PSA ; Stage T2c Any two three intermediate risk factor Lymph node involvement ( N1 ) Evidence distant metastasis ( M1 ) Any hormonal blockade therapy : Has persist 6 month time protocol screen ; OR Is ongoing within 3 month study enrollment Radical surgery carcinoma prostate Prior pelvic radiation Previous concurrent cancer basal , situ , squamous cell skin cancer unless diseasefree ≥ 5 year Major medical psychiatric illness , investigator 's opinion , would prevent completion treatment would interfere followup Hip prosthesis Inability refusal provide inform consent
